foreignData.name: Mizzix, Duplikatreiterin
foreignData.text:
Fliegend
Immer wenn du einen Zauberspruch von irgendwoher außer deiner Hand wirkst, kannst du {1}{U/R} bezahlen. Falls du dies tust, kopiere den Zauberspruch. Du kannst neue Ziele für die Kopie bestimmen. Falls die Kopie ein Bleibende-Karte-Zauberspruch ist, erhält er Eile und „Zu Beginn deines Endsegments opferst du diese bleibende Karte." (Eine Kopie eines Bleibende-Karte-Zauberspruchs wird zu einem Spielstein.)

foreignData.name: Mízzix, jinete de réplicas
foreignData.text:
Vuela.
Siempre que lances un hechizo desde cualquier parte excepto desde tu mano, puedes pagar {1}{U/R}. Si lo haces, copia ese hechizo. Puedes elegir nuevos objetivos para la copia. Si la copia es un hechizo de permanente, gana la habilidad de prisa y "Al comienzo de tu paso final, sacrifica este permanente". (Una copia de un hechizo de permanente se convierte en una ficha.)

foreignData.name: Mizzix, chevaucheuse de reproduction
foreignData.text:
Vol
À chaque fois que vous lancez un sort depuis autre part que votre main, vous pouvez payer {1}{U/R}. Si vous faites ainsi, copiez ce sort et vous pouvez choisir de nouvelles cibles pour la copie. Si la copie est un sort de permanent, elle acquiert la célérité et « Au début de votre étape de fin, sacrifiez ce permanent. » (Une copie d'un sort de permanent devient un jeton.)

foreignData.name: Mizzix, Cavalcatrice della Replica
foreignData.text:
Volare
Ogniqualvolta lanci una magia da una zona diversa dalla tua mano, puoi pagare {1}{U/R}. Se lo fai, copia quella magia e puoi scegliere nuovi bersagli per la copia. Se la copia è una magia permanente, ha rapidità e "All'inizio della tua sottofase finale, sacrifica questo permanente". (Una copia di una magia permanente diventa una pedina.)

foreignData.name: 模造品乗り、ミジックス
foreignData.text:
飛行
あなたがあなたの手札以外から呪文を唱えるたび、あなたは{1}{U/R}を支払ってもよい。そうしたなら、その呪文をコピーし、あなたはそのコピーの新しい対象を選んでもよい。そのコピーがパーマネント・呪文であるなら、それは速攻と「あなたの終了ステップの開始時に、このパーマネントを生け贄に捧げる。」を得る。（パーマネント・呪文のコピーはトークンになる。）
foreignData.type: 伝説のクリーチャー — ゴブリン・ウィザード

foreignData.name: 摹械骑士米捷兹
foreignData.text:
飞行
每当你从你手牌以外的任何区域施放咒语时，你可以支付{1}{U/R}。若你如此作，则复制该咒语，且你可以为该复制品选择新的目标。如果该复制品是永久物咒语，则它获得敏捷与「在你的结束步骤开始时，牺牲此永久物。」（永久物咒语的复制品会成为衍生物。）

mainBoard.name: Mizzix, Replica Rider
mainBoard.originalText:
Flying
Whenever you cast a spell from anywhere other than your hand, you may pay {1}{UR}. If you do, copy that spell and you may choose new targets for the copy. If the copy is a permanent spell, it gains haste and "At the beginning of your end step, sacrifice this permanent." (A copy of a permanent spell becomes a token.)

rulings.text: Any spell you cast will be copied if you pay the cost, not just one that requires targets.

If a copy is created, you control the copy. That copy is created on the stack, so it's not "cast." Abilities that trigger when a player casts a spell won't trigger. The copy will then resolve like a normal spell, after players get a chance to cast spells and activate abilities.
If the copied spell has an X whose value was determined as it was cast, the copy has the same value of X.
If the copied spell is modal (that is, it says "Choose one –" or the like), the copy will have the same mode. You can't choose a different one.

The copy will have the same targets as the spell it's copying unless you choose new ones. You may change any number of the targets, including all of them or none of them. If, for one of the targets, you can't choose a new legal target, then it remains unchanged (even if the current target is illegal).

You can't choose to pay any additional costs for the copy. However, effects based on any additional costs that were paid for the original spell are copied as though those same costs were paid for the copy too. For example, if you sacrifice a 3/3 creature to cast Fling, and you copy it, the copy of Fling will also deal 3 damage to its target.
You may only pay the cost once, as the triggered ability resolves. You can't pay it more than once to get additional copies.

mainBoard.text:
Flying
Whenever you cast a spell from anywhere other than your hand, you may pay {1}{U/R}. If you do, copy that spell and you may choose new targets for the copy. If the copy is a permanent spell, it gains haste and "At the beginning of your end step, sacrifice this permanent." (A copy of a permanent spell becomes a token.)

mainBoard.flavorText: Naturally inquisitive and adaptable, goblins can turn their small stature to their advantage as rogues.

foreignData.flavorText: Goblins sind von Natur aus wissbegierig und anpassungsfähig. Als Räuber können sie ihre kleine Statur zu ihrem Vorteil nutzen.
foreignData.name: Grotag-Nachtstürmer
foreignData.text: Immer wenn der Grotag-Nachtstürmer einem Spieler Kampfschaden zufügt, schicke die oberste Karte deiner Bibliothek ins Exil. Du kannst sie in diesem Zug spielen.

foreignData.flavorText: Curiosos y flexibles por naturaleza. Los trasgos bribones son capaces de sacar provecho a su baja estatura.
foreignData.name: Corredor nocturno grotag
foreignData.text: Siempre que el Corredor nocturno grotag haga daño de combate a un jugador, exilia la primera carta de tu biblioteca. Puedes jugar esa carta este turno.

foreignData.flavorText: Naturellement curieux et capables de s'adapter, les gobelins peuvent mettre leur petite taille à profit en devenant de parfaits gredins.
foreignData.name: Coureur de nuit grotag
foreignData.text: À chaque fois que le Coureur de nuit grotag inflige des blessures de combat à un joueur, exilez la carte du dessus de votre bibliothèque. Vous pouvez jouer cette carte ce tour-ci.

foreignData.flavorText: Curiosi e adattabili per natura, i goblin possono sfruttare la loro statura ridotta a proprio vantaggio come furfanti.
foreignData.name: Corridore Notturno Grotag
foreignData.text: Ogniqualvolta il Corridore Notturno Grotag infligge danno da combattimento a un giocatore, esilia la prima carta del tuo grimorio. Puoi giocare quella carta in questo turno.

foreignData.flavorText: 生まれつき詮索好きで適応力もあるゴブリンは、低身長を盗みの利点に変えられる。
foreignData.name: グロータグの夜走り
foreignData.text: グロータグの夜走りがプレイヤー１人に戦闘ダメージを与えるたび、あなたのライブラリーの一番上にあるカード１枚を追放する。このターン、あなたはそのカードをプレイしてもよい。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — ゴブリン・ならず者

foreignData.flavorText: 鬼怪天生好奇心旺盛，又极易适应周遭环境，当起浪客来更能将自己个头矮小的优势发挥得淋漓尽致。
foreignData.name: 葛塔夜奔客
foreignData.text: 每当葛塔夜奔客对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，放逐你的牌库顶牌。本回合中，你可以使用该牌。

mainBoard.name: Grotag Night-Runner
mainBoard.originalText: Whenever Grotag Night-Runner deals combat damage to a player, exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn.

rulings.text: If you don’t play the exiled card, it remains exiled.
You must follow the normal timing permissions and restrictions for the exiled card. If it’s a land, you can’t play it unless you have land plays available.
You’ll still pay all costs for a spell cast this way, including additional costs. You may also pay alternative costs if any are available.

mainBoard.text: Whenever Grotag Night-Runner deals combat damage to a player, exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn.

foreignData.flavorText: Jeder Sturm hat ein Auge.
foreignData.name: Zyklop-Elektromagier
foreignData.text: Wenn der Zyklop-Elektromagier ins Spiel kommt, fügt er einer Kreatur deiner Wahl, die ein Gegner kontrolliert, X Schadenspunkte zu, wobei X gleich der Anzahl an Spontanzauber- und Hexereikarten in deinem Friedhof ist.

foreignData.flavorText: Todas las tormentas tienen un ojo.
foreignData.name: Electromante cíclope
foreignData.text: Cuando el Electromante cíclope entre al campo de batalla, hace X puntos de daño a la criatura objetivo que controla un oponente, donde X es la cantidad de cartas de instantáneo y de conjuro en tu cementerio.

foreignData.flavorText: Tous les cyclones ont un œil.
foreignData.name: Électromancien cyclope
foreignData.text: Quand l'Électromancien cyclope arrive sur le champ de bataille, il inflige X blessures à une créature ciblée qu'un adversaire contrôle, X étant le nombre de cartes d'éphémère et de rituel dans votre cimetière.

foreignData.flavorText: Ogni ciclone ha un occhio.
foreignData.name: Ciclope Elettromante
foreignData.text: Quando il Ciclope Elettromante entra nel campo di battaglia, infligge X danni a una creatura bersaglio controllata da un avversario, dove X è il numero di carte istantaneo e stregoneria nel tuo cimitero.

foreignData.flavorText: 嵐には目がある。
foreignData.name: サイクロプスの電術師
foreignData.text: サイクロプスの電術師が戦場に出たとき、対戦相手がコントロールしているクリーチャー１体を対象とする。これはそれにＸ点のダメージを与える。Ｘはあなたの墓地にありインスタントやソーサリーであるカードの枚数に等しい。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — サイクロプス・ウィザード

foreignData.flavorText: 每场风暴都有暴风眼。

foreignData.text: 当独眼巨人电流术士进战场时，它向目标由对手操控的生物造成X点伤害，X为你坟墓场中瞬间与法术牌的数量加总。

mainBoard.name: Cyclops Electromancer
mainBoard.originalText: When Cyclops Electromancer enters the battlefield, it deals X damage to target creature an opponent controls, where X is the number of instant and sorcery cards in your graveyard.

rulings.text: A split card that’s both an instant and a sorcery is counted only once for Cyclops Electromancer’s ability.
The number of instant and sorcery cards in your graveyard is counted only as Cyclops Electromancer’s ability resolves.

mainBoard.text: When Cyclops Electromancer enters, it deals X damage to target creature an opponent controls, where X is the number of instant and sorcery cards in your graveyard.

守军

mainBoard.name: Thermo-Alchemist
mainBoard.originalText:
Defender
{T}: Thermo-Alchemist deals 1 damage to each opponent.
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, untap Thermo-Alchemist.

rulings.text: In a Two-Headed Giant game, Thermo-Alchemist's activated ability causes the opposing team to lose 2 life.

Thermo-Alchemist's triggered ability resolves before the spell that caused it to trigger. It resolves even if that spell is countered. Players can cast spells and activate abilities (such as Thermo-Alchemist's own activated ability) after the triggered ability resolves but before the spell that caused it to trigger does.

mainBoard.text:
Defender
{T}: Thermo-Alchemist deals 1 damage to each opponent.
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, untap Thermo-Alchemist.

mainBoard.flavorText: Sparkmages are performance artists of sorts, but pain is the price of admission.

foreignData.flavorText: Funkenzauberer sind wahre Künstler, doch der Preis für das Zuschauen ist Schmerz.

foreignData.text: Opfere das Katalysierende Elementarwesen: Erzeuge {R}{R}.

foreignData.flavorText: 超风暴发生器一过临界值，电弧中便冒出一个生物。

mainBoard.name: Catalyst Elemental

mainBoard.flavorText: Slonk was struck by lightning twenty-seven times before he got the idea. Another forty-three hits and he'd perfected it.

foreignData.flavorText: Slonk wurde siebenundzwanzig Mal vom Blitz getroffen, bevor er auf die Idee kam. Weitere dreiundvierzig Treffer und er hatte es perfektioniert.
foreignData.name: Goblinforscher
foreignData.text: Wenn der Goblinforscher ins Spiel kommt, schicke die oberste Karte deiner Bibliothek ins Exil. Während eines beliebigen Zuges, in dem du mit dem Goblinforscher angegriffen hast, kannst du die Karte spielen.

foreignData.flavorText: A Slonk le cayeron veintisiete rayos encima antes de que se le ocurriese una idea. Cuarenta y tres rayos más tarde, la perfeccionó.
foreignData.name: Investigador trasgo
foreignData.text: Cuando el Investigador trasgo entre al campo de batalla, exilia la primera carta de tu biblioteca. Durante cualquier turno en el que atacaste con el Investigador trasgo, puedes jugar esa carta.

foreignData.flavorText: Slonk avait été frappé par la foudre vingt-sept fois avant d'avoir l'idée. Encore quarante-trois fois, et il l'avait perfectionnée.
foreignData.name: Chercheur gobelin
foreignData.text: Quand le Chercheur gobelin arrive sur le champ de bataille, exilez la carte du dessus de votre bibliothèque. Pendant chaque tour où vous avez attaqué avec le Chercheur gobelin, vous pouvez jouer cette carte.

foreignData.flavorText: Slonk fu colpito ventisette volte da un fulmine prima che gli venisse l'idea. Dopo altre quarantatré saette, l'aveva perfezionata.
foreignData.name: Goblin Ricercatore
foreignData.text: Quando il Goblin Ricercatore entra nel campo di battaglia, esilia la prima carta del tuo grimorio. Durante qualsiasi turno in cui hai attaccato con il Goblin Ricercatore, puoi giocare quella carta.

foreignData.flavorText: スロンクはひらめくまでの間に二十七回も雷に打たれた。あと四十三回打たれれば、完璧に仕上げるだろう。
foreignData.name: ゴブリンの研究者
foreignData.text: ゴブリンの研究者が戦場に出たとき、あなたのライブラリーの一番上にあるカード１枚を追放する。あなたがゴブリンの研究者で攻撃したターンの間、あなたはそのカードをプレイしてもよい。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — ゴブリン・ウィザード

foreignData.flavorText: 司隆克在被闪电劈中二十七次后，终于有个想法。再被劈中四十三次后，他才把这想法完善成形。
foreignData.name: 鬼怪学究
foreignData.text: 当鬼怪学究进战场时，放逐你的牌库顶牌。于你以鬼怪学究攻击过的回合中，你可以使用该牌。

mainBoard.name: Goblin Researcher
mainBoard.originalText: When Goblin Researcher enters the battlefield, exile the top card of your library. During any turn you attacked with Goblin Researcher, you may play that card.

rulings.text: Casting an exiled card causes it to leave exile. You can't cast it multiple times.
Goblin Researcher's effect doesn't change when you can play the exiled card. For example, if you exile a sorcery card, you can cast it only during your main phase when the stack is empty.
If you control more than one card named Goblin Researcher, each one's effect is independent from the other. Specifically, attacking with one will not allow you to play the card exiled by the other.

If you exile a land card with Goblin Researcher's enters-the-battlefield ability, you may play that land only if you have any available land plays. Normally, this means you can play the land only if you haven't played a land yet that turn.
The card Goblin Researcher exiles is exiled face up.
You can play the exiled card if Goblin Researcher attacked and is still in combat, has left combat, has left the battlefield, or even if combat is over.

mainBoard.text: When Goblin Researcher enters, exile the top card of your library. During any turn you attacked with Goblin Researcher, you may play that card.

foreignData.name: Elektrische Offenbarung
foreignData.text:
Wirf als zusätzliche Kosten, um diesen Zauberspruch zu wirken, eine Karte ab.
Ziehe zwei Karten.
Rückblende {3}{R} (Du kannst diese Karte aus deinem Friedhof für ihre Rückblendekosten und zusätzliche Kosten wirken. Schicke sie danach ins Exil.)

foreignData.text:

foreignData.name: Révélation électrique
foreignData.text:

foreignData.text:

返照{3}{R}（你可以从你坟墓场中施放此牌，并支付其返照费用及额外费用，然后将它放逐。）

rulings.text: If you cast Electric Revelation using flashback, you must still pay its additional cost of discarding a card.

foreignData.flavorText:

foreignData.name: Funke der Kreativität
foreignData.text: Bestimme eine Kreatur deiner Wahl. Schicke die oberste Karte deiner Bibliothek ins Exil. Du kannst den Funken der Kreativität jener Kreatur Schaden in Höhe des Manabetrags der ins Exil geschickten Karte zufügen lassen. Falls du dies nicht tust, kannst du die Karte bis zum Ende des Zuges spielen.

foreignData.flavorText:
"Inventar es rebelarse".
—Pia Nalaar
foreignData.name: Chispa de creatividad
foreignData.text: Elige una criatura objetivo. Exilia la primera carta de tu biblioteca. Puedes hacer que la Chispa de creatividad haga una cantidad de daño a esa criatura igual al valor de maná de la carta exiliada. Si no lo haces, puedes jugar esa carta hasta el final del turno.

foreignData.flavorText:
« Inventer c'est se rebeller. »
—Pia Nalaàr
foreignData.name: Étincelle de créativité
foreignData.text: Choisissez une créature ciblée. Exilez la carte du dessus de votre bibliothèque. Vous pouvez faire que l'Étincelle de créativité inflige à cette créature un nombre de blessures égal à la valeur de mana de la carte exilée. Si vous ne le faites pas, vous pouvez jouer cette carte jusqu'à la fin du tour.

foreignData.flavorText:
"Ogni invenzione è una ribellione."
—Pia Nalaar
foreignData.name: Scintilla di Creatività
foreignData.text: Scegli una creatura bersaglio. Esilia la prima carta del tuo grimorio. Puoi far infliggere alla Scintilla di Creatività danno pari al valore di mana della carta esiliata a quella creatura. Se non lo fai, puoi giocare quella carta fino alla fine del turno.

foreignData.flavorText:
「発明とは、覆すこと。」
――ピア・ナラー
foreignData.name: 独創の火花
foreignData.text: クリーチャー１体を対象とする。あなたのライブラリーの一番上にあるカード１枚を追放する。あなたは「独創の火花はそのクリーチャーに、その追放したカードのマナ総量に等しい点数のダメージを与える。」を選んでもよい。そうしないなら、ターン終了時まで、あなたはそのカードをプレイしてもよい。

foreignData.flavorText:
「发明即反抗。」
～琵雅纳拉
foreignData.name: 创意火花
foreignData.text: 选择目标生物。放逐你的牌库顶牌。你可以使创意火花对该生物造成伤害，其数量等同于所放逐之牌的法术力值。如果你未如此作，则直到回合结束，你可以使用该牌。

mainBoard.name: Spark of Creativity
mainBoard.originalText: Choose target creature. Exile the top card of your library. You may have Spark of Creativity deal damage to that creature equal to the exiled card's mana value. If you don't, you may play that card until end of turn.

rulings.text: If a card in exile has {X} in its mana cost, X is considered to be 0.
If a land card is exiled this way, you can play that land card until end of turn if you have any available land plays.
Spark of Creativity doesn't change when you can play the exiled card. For example, if you exile a creature card without flash, you can cast it only during your main phase when the stack is empty.

You can't cast Spark of Creativity without targeting a creature. If the creature becomes an illegal target for Spark of Creativity, none of its effects happen. You don't exile the top card of your library.
You must pay all costs to play the exiled card. You may pay alternative or additional costs. If the card has any mandatory additional costs, you must pay those.

mainBoard.text: Choose target creature. Exile the top card of your library. You may have Spark of Creativity deal damage to that creature equal to the exiled card's mana value. If you don't, you may play that card until end of turn.

mainBoard.flavorText: "You don't want to know what happens after I put on the goggles."

foreignData.flavorText: „Du willst nicht wissen, was geschieht, wenn ich die Schutzbrille aufgesetzt habe."
foreignData.name: Impulsives Handeln
foreignData.text: Schicke die obersten drei Karten deiner Bibliothek ins Exil. Du kannst sie bis zum Ende des Zuges spielen. (Falls du auf diese Weise einen Zauberspruch wirkst, bezahlst du immer noch seine Kosten. Du kannst auf diese Weise nur ein Land spielen, falls du in diesem Zug noch eines spielen darfst.)

foreignData.flavorText: "No te conviene saber lo que ocurre una vez que me pongo las gafas".
foreignData.name: Actuar por impulso
foreignData.text: Exilia las tres primeras cartas de tu biblioteca. Hasta el final del turno, puedes jugar esas cartas. (Si lanzas un hechizo de esta manera, sigues pagando sus costes. Puedes jugar una tierra de esta manera solo si te queda una jugada de tierra disponible.)

foreignData.flavorText: « Jetons un voile pudique sur ce qui se passe une fois mes lunettes chaussées. »
foreignData.name: Agir par impulsion
foreignData.text: Exilez les trois cartes du dessus de votre bibliothèque. Jusqu'à la fin du tour, vous pouvez jouer ces cartes. (Si vous lancez un sort de cette manière, vous payez toujours ses coûts. Vous ne pouvez jouer un terrain de cette manière que s'il vous reste une mise en jeu de terrain disponible.)

foreignData.flavorText: "Non vuoi sapere cosa succede quando mi metto gli occhialoni."
foreignData.name: Agire d'Impulso
foreignData.text: Esilia le prime tre carte del tuo grimorio. Fino alla fine del turno, puoi giocare quelle carte. (Se lanci una magia in questo modo, paghi comunque i suoi costi. Puoi giocare una terra in questo modo solo se potresti giocarne una normalmente.)

foreignData.flavorText: 「私がゴーグルをつけたら何が起こるかなんて、知らないほうが身のためよ。」
foreignData.name: 衝動的な行動
foreignData.text: あなたのライブラリーの一番上にあるカード３枚を追放する。ターン終了時まで、あなたはそれらのカードをプレイしてもよい。（これにより呪文を唱えるなら、その呪文のコストを支払う必要がある。これにより土地をプレイするには、あなたは土地プレイを残している必要がある。）

foreignData.flavorText: 「你不会想知道我戴上防护镜之后会发生什么。」
foreignData.name: 逞性妄为
foreignData.text: 放逐你牌库顶的三张牌。直到回合结束，你可以使用这些牌。（如果你以此法施放咒语，你依旧要支付其费用。你只能于你仍有可使用地数的时候，才能以此法使用地。）

mainBoard.name: Act on Impulse
mainBoard.originalText: Exile the top three cards of your library. Until end of turn, you may play those cards. (If you cast a spell this way, you still pay its costs. You can play a land this way only if you have an available land play remaining.)

rulings.text: Any cards you don't play will remain exiled.

Playing a card this way follows the normal rules for playing the card. You must pay its costs, and you must follow all applicable timing rules. For example, if one of the cards is a creature card, you can cast that card only during your main phase while the stack is empty.
The cards are exiled face up.
Under normal circumstances, you can play a land card exiled with Act on Impulse only if you haven't played a land yet that turn.

mainBoard.text: Exile the top three cards of your library. Until end of turn, you may play those cards. (If you cast a spell this way, you still pay its costs. You can play a land this way only if you have an available land play remaining.)

mainBoard.name: Firebolt
mainBoard.originalText:
Firebolt deals 2 damage to any target.
Flashback {4}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

rulings.text: A spell cast using flashback will always be exiled afterward, whether it resolves, is countered, or leaves the stack in some other way.
If a card with flashback is put into your graveyard during your turn, you can cast it if it’s legal to do so before any other player can take any actions.

To determine the total cost of a spell, start with the mana cost or alternative cost (such as a flashback cost) you’re paying, add any cost increases, then apply any cost reductions. The mana value of the spell is determined only by its mana cost, no matter what the total cost to cast the spell was.
You can cast a spell using flashback even if it was somehow put into your graveyard without having been cast.

You must still follow any timing restrictions and permissions, including those based on the card’s type. For instance, you can cast a sorcery using flashback only when you could normally cast a sorcery.

“Flashback [cost]” means “You may cast this card from your graveyard by paying [cost] rather than paying its mana cost” and “If the flashback cost was paid, exile this card instead of putting it anywhere else any time it would leave the stack.”

mainBoard.text:
Firebolt deals 2 damage to any target.
Flashback {4}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

mainBoard.flavorText: As eons passed, the rock wore away, revealing the rich colors at the mountain's heart.

foreignData.flavorText: Im Laufe der Äonen wurde der Fels abgetragen, sodass die satten Farben im Herzen des Gebirges sichtbar wurden.
foreignData.name: Gedeihende Felsklippe
foreignData.text:
Die Gedeihende Felsklippe kommt getappt ins Spiel.
Sowie die Gedeihende Felsklippe ins Spiel kommt, bestimme eine Farbe außer Rot.
{T}: Erzeuge {R} oder ein Mana der bestimmten Farbe.

foreignData.flavorText: A medida que pasaban los siglos, la roca se iba erosionando, revelando así los bellos colores del corazón de la montaña.
foreignData.name: Risco floreciente
foreignData.text:
El Risco floreciente entra al campo de batalla girado.
En cuanto el Risco floreciente entre al campo de batalla, elige un color que no sea rojo.
{T}: Agrega {R} o un maná del color elegido.

foreignData.flavorText: Au fil des éons, la pierre s'est érodée, révélant les couleurs vives du cœur de la montagne.
foreignData.name: Promontoire prospère
foreignData.text:
Le Promontoire prospère arrive sur le champ de bataille engagé.
Au moment où le Promontoire prospère arrive sur le champ de bataille, choisissez une couleur autre que le rouge.
{T} : Ajoutez {R} ou un mana de la couleur choisie.

foreignData.flavorText: Col passare delle ere, la pietra si erose, rivelando i brillanti colori nel cuore della montagna.
foreignData.name: Falesia Florida
foreignData.text:
La Falesia Florida entra nel campo di battaglia TAPpata.
Mentre la Falesia Florida entra nel campo di battaglia, scegli un colore diverso dal rosso.
{T}: Aggiungi {R} o un mana del colore scelto.

foreignData.flavorText: 悠久の時を経て岩肌は削られ、山の中心の豊かな色彩が露わになった。
foreignData.name: 興隆する絶壁
foreignData.text:
興隆する絶壁はタップ状態で戦場に出る。
興隆する絶壁が戦場に出るに際し、赤でない色１色を選ぶ。
{T}：{R} か、その選ばれた色のマナ１点を加える。

foreignData.flavorText: 无数世代过去，石头磨损，显露出高山核心处的丰富颜色。
foreignData.name: 兴旺绝壁
foreignData.text:
兴旺绝壁须横置进战场。
于兴旺绝壁进战场时，选择一种红色以外的颜色。
{T}：加{R}或一点所选颜色的法术力。

mainBoard.name: Thriving Bluff
mainBoard.originalText:
Thriving Bluff enters the battlefield tapped.
As Thriving Bluff enters the battlefield, choose a color other than red.
{T}: Add {R} or one mana of the chosen color.
mainBoard.text:
Thriving Bluff enters tapped. As it enters, choose a color other than red.
